snippet: Alex Rodriguez’s lawsuit claiming Major League Baseball and Commissioner Bud Selig went on a “witch hunt” to force him from the sport was moved to federal court from state court.
abstract: Alex Rodriguez’s lawsuit claiming Major League Baseball and Commissioner Bud Selig went on a 'witch hunt' to force him from the sport is moved to federal court from state court.
lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez’s lawsuit claiming Major League Baseball and Commissioner Bud Selig went on a “witch hunt” to force him from the sport was moved to federal court from state court.
